## TransactionWatcher class

TransactionWatcher allows one to continuously watch (monitor), by means of polling, the status of a given transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TransactionWatcher 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(fetcher, options)](./sdk-core.transactionwatcher._constructor_.md) |  | A transaction watcher (awaiter). |
